summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1332, for the improvement of Twenty-third Avenue North, from a point two hundred fifty (250) feet south of East Prospect Street to East Galer Street, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing therein water mains and sewers of proper dimensions and material, together with all necessary appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 14978 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, declaring the same to be a first lien thereon, and providing for the collection of said assessment.
